displayProperties.description: A challenge awaits…
displayProperties.name: Strangers in Time

displayProperties.description:
To win, be the first team to summon and defeat your Primeval. 

Motes: Defeated foes will drop Motes you can pick up. Watch out! If you die, you'll lose any Motes you're holding. 

Bank: Deposit Motes you're holding in the bank. Bank enough Motes, and you'll summon a Primeval. 

Blockers: Bank enough Motes at once to summon Blockers that lock the opposing team's bank. 

Invasions: As your team banks Motes, an invasion portal will open, allowing you to enter the opposing team's area. Take them out to make them drop their Motes!
displayProperties.name: Gambit Rules
